modulesHeader.title: Elective modules of Avans
modulesHeader.description: On this page you will find an overview of all available elective modules. Use the filters to search for modules that match your interests and study.

ai.title: AI Support
ai.interestsPlaceholder: Describe your interests, hobbies, or future career here. For example: 'I love gaming and want to learn entrepreneurship', or 'I want to dive deeper into psychology and law'.
ai.tagsLabel: Select tags that match your interests
ai.explanation: Below you will find the top 5 modules that best fit your profile, based on your interests and preferences.
ai.reasonExplanation: This insight is based on the match between your interests, selected tags, and the specific content of this module.

validation.interestsTooShort: Description must be at least 10 characters.

validation.tagsRequired: Please select at least one tag.
